text:
Just put permanently close la! Why put still open at Google..
If move to another place please put the real address!
Call also no answer really roti la! Coi
Good cool environment with its brand theme. But the drink that we ordered are quite disappointing compares to Sutera Mall standard.
Good place, clean and has good vibe. Nice to hang out with friends. Staff very friendly and good service.

Being a boba lover, after trying it out so many different brands, The Alley still remains my all time favorite! Amazing to see how positive the staffs are with their service and efficiency in spite of this difficult time. Incredible!

First time trying The Alley! Defo lived up to its name of being a lifestyle.

Went after dinner at Eco-Botanika, was a + point as it closes at 11pm instead. Great place to hang out w friends.

Drinks were unique and refreshing to end the night on a good note!

Friendly service and pleasing ambience.
Will defo be back w friends!
